features: 【EXCELLENT CONFIGURATION】The free "Walk Print"APP is built for users. The bluetooth photo printer adopts high-quality ink-free thermal print head, though bluetooth to connect Android or iOS systems, high-quality print head resolution up to 203dpi, mini printed sticker maker is qualified sticker printer and flexible label maker ~ ready to print all kinds of required labels and stickers. Built-in 1000mAH lithium battery, fully charged mini portable printer can work for 15 hours!

【MINI THERMAL PRINTER】According to the manual, download the "Walk Print" APP through phone; open the note printer box containing the printing paper, put in the type of printing paper you need to use, after the mini bluetooth printer is turned on, connect the APP on the mobile phone through Bluetooth, you can print. If you receive a defective sticker printer machine or have any questions about our portable photo printer, please contact us anytime, we will try our best to give you the best solution.

【HIGH QUALITY PORTABLE THERMAL PRINTER】 This mini sticker printer uses no ink, no cable.toner or ribbon. Use thermal paper instead of ink, save money, the mini thermal printer kit comes with 1 rolls of paper (Installed inside the the mini picture printer), Printed black and white photos can be graffiti and share parent-child graffiti time with your children.

【INKLESS PORTABLE MINI PRINTER】The size of the the inkless pocket printer is 3.46x3.2x1.94 inches. This pocket printer is small and portable, can be put into your pocket or bag, the portable printer for phone can immediately print out the phone recordings, photos and documents needed for photos, record your life, work and study anytime and anywhere, it is the ideal accessory for students, travelers and anyone who needs to take a portable mini printer.and is ideal for Halloween, Thanksgiving day, Christmas and holiday present to family and friends.

【WIDE RANGE OF USE】This mini inkless printer is suitable for printing black and white photos, documents, recordings, memos, web pages, labels, barcode stickers, post-it notes, and can also be fixed for horizontal or vertical printing.This mini printer also for company business, work plan, office assistant, memo, meeting notes, study notes, shopping list. Suitable for office, students, amateur archivists, treasure moms etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Portable Bluetooth Thermal Sticker Printer Mini Thermal Printer Mini thermal printer, with a portable design, you can take it with you and print photos anytime, anywhere. The only black and white printing can print photos, labels, record, web pages, QR codes, etc.The information and image on the phone screen can be printed instantly, help you to organize and summarize work plans, shopping lists, etc, can improve efficiency.

Mini Mobile Printer with Powerful APP Multifunctional Use APP Plenty of templates, graphics, themes, and fonts for you to choose to print. Importantly, everything in the APP is permanently free, just one click to print, saving you a lot of time, making your work richer and life more interesting, come and enjoy your printing journey!

Wireless Bluetooth Connection Easily and quickly connect the printer to your iPhone via wireless Bluetooth 4.0. It supports both Android and iOS operating systems. The printer is equipped with a high-quality print head and can print on 57mm (width) x 30mm (roll diameter) thermal paper with a resolution of 203 DPI. This high-quality pocket thermal printer consumes low power and has a built-in 1000mAH lithium battery that can last for 15 hours on a single charge.

Inkless pocket printer This compact pocket printer features a small and lightweight body with a stylish design ,You can easily carry it in your pocket or bag and take it anywhere you go. Whether you're using it at home, at the office, or on the go, this printer is sure to turn heads. Mini inkless printer is suitable for printing black and white photos, documents, recordings, memos, web pages, labels, barcode stickers.it is the ideal accessory for students, travelers and anyone who needs to take a portable mini printer.

Inkless thermal printer Inkless printer Equipped with a high-quality thermal print head that generates patterns on thermal paper by heating without using ink. Patterns can only be printed on black and white photos. 203DPI high-resolution black and white images can be printed more clearly.

Ideal Gift Mini Sticker Printer, excellent design, convenient usability, can make it a good assistant in life, cultivate children's creativity, record happy moments at any time, and at the same time, he can be a very special gift for friends, children, loved ones, DIY enthusiasts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small, prints light
reviews.reviewText: This printer is an awesome concept, but this particular one is just ok. The prints are lighter than expected and not great visually. I wanted this for my daughter to print stickers for her room, but I'm not sure how much she will use it. The thermal paper is very thin and it's included. Would make a fun gift for a younger kid.Item reviewed: PRINHSJI Mini Portable Printer, Pocket Thermal Printer, Sticker Printer Machine, Inkless Pocket Printer Compatible with iOS & Android,Inkless Printer Mini with 10 Rolls Paper & 5 Color Pens

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this printer. Enjoyed using it, very nice quality, sent many extra roles including ones with tape, and sent markers. App is good quality and works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun for kids!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for my 10-year-old daughter to use. She mainly uses it to print off drawings to color. She also prints pictures off as well. The quality isn’t the greatest as far as sharpness and clarity. However, she's just using it to play with and it works great for her. She loves being able to have her own printer to use with her iPad. It's easy to use with the app. It's a great price to!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent text quality
reviews.reviewText: The text quality of the prints is decent. I wouldn't use it for pictures. I had to go to a custom darkness setting to get the print dark enough to read. The only change I would make it for the tear teeth to be towards the top rather than the bottom of where the paper exits. It feels more natural to tear the paper in that direction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very small prints in black & white
reviews.reviewText: This printer is small and makes really small photos when you print - the clip in my photo is for reference on the size. This printer requires putting an app on your phone to connect with the printer. The final picture size on my test print was 1-3/4” x 1-1/4”. The paper it uses is essentially receipt paper. It came with 5 rolls of paper, 5 rolls of sticker paper and some small markers for coloring. The paper is easy to replace in the printer. It’s a cute printer for kids to play with, but that’s about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My daughter loves it
reviews.reviewText: She said minus one really grainy one she figured it out very easily and loves it. Easy to use, and awesome little quick printer for her to have. Pretty impressive!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't print vert dark
reviews.reviewText: The print out comes out fairly light, wish it was darker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice compact printer with paper
reviews.reviewText: Good prints and nice supplies come with it.
